entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • string.Join with first element null status #86823
  • [browser][wasm-mt] Regression with asset loading, improper URL resolution for WebWorker file #86819
  • Add trace events to scenarios where a certificate is loaded and used by an application to monitor for expiration #86814
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonEncoder (rather than JavaScriptEncoder) #86810
  • Provide a runtime package through the store #86808
  • Default JSON escaping is biased against other languages #86805
  • Host Feature request: Enable FDD apps to always get the globally installed runtime #86801
  • Read/Write Big/LittleEndian support for Guid #86798
    8.0.0
  • running windows code in net6 target project #86797
  • [API Proposal]: Expose Version on List<T> and similar Enumerables #86795
  • [wasm][hybridglobalization] ToUpper/ToLower does not work correctly when the length of character changes #86794
    8.0.0
  • LibraryImportGenerator should generate code using "global::" #86786
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: InstrumentRecorder - notification of new measurements #86783
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Support for adding default tags to specific meter and/or instruments #84321
    8.0.0
  • [Tracking] Figure out how we should handle the disposing of the meters created from meter factory #86592
    8.0.0
  • [Tracking] Decide if the tags order matter when creating meter or instrument #86614
    8.0.0
  • DefaultMeterFactory.Create and MeterOptions.Scope #86684
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Uuid data type #86084
  • JIT: Physical promotion readback mechanism does not take implicit control flow into account #86498
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in Utf8Formatter #84989
  • Blazor Wasm: debugging broken by attribute with type parameter #86765
    8.0.0
  • Cmdline arguments are not parsed correctly using System.Environment.CommandLine #84723
  • [Analyzer suggestion]: Avoid recursive iterators #85015
  • Provide Minimal JSON Escaping Implementation #86800
    Future
  • Vector256.Shuffle() returns incorrect result when index is out of bounds #85132
  • Inconsistent comments on `Convert.ChangeType` #85299
  • Topological Sort in S.T.J source generator not correct #86702
    8.0.0
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23264.1] Apps that using BinaryFormatter will get System.NotSupportedException Exception #86308
  • System.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames missing types #1489
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add more entries to MediaTypeNames #85807
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.ToBoolean supports "1" and "0" values #86579
  • `double.Parse` with `NumberStyles.Currency` Fails to Parse Strings with Non-Breaking Spaces #86641
  • [NativeAOT] How to export functions for executables? #86788
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\Activator\\Activator\\Activator #86569
    8.0.0
  • Compiled regex timeout skewed on first evaluation #54747
    Future
  • Arm64: Generate conditional comparison and selection instructions #55364
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: make global morph its own phase, morph blocks in RPO #86822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix recursive type support when consuming source generated code from the .NET 6 sdk. #86821
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • unroll byref struct copies #86820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2189240 #86818
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change the LockCreated event to ContentionLockCreated #86817
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Unify trim warnings for accessing compiler generated code #86816
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Support new JMC #86815
    area-Debugger-mono
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #86812
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Devirtualization with multiple guesses: JIT #86809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update to use the cbl-mariner webassembly images. #86806
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ID regression in Alpine Linux builds #86804
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update to the 22.04 debpkg image so we're on a newer ubuntu version. #86803
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • POH allocation fix #86802
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][globalization] `HybridGlobalization` fix bug in change case #86799
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Use Span to fill List<T> in more ToList scenarios #86796
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Optimize Load Immediate #86790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add NativeAOT build and runtime pack for linux-bionic #86781
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #85692
    area-Infrastructure
  • Address Metrics APIs issues #86740
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Dump data in proc test #86784
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Add support for types with parameterized ctors to config binder gen #86365
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Change our Android build and test legs to use the new CBL-Mariner-based images. #86776
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix StringMarshalling error message and actually copy attributes from methods to shadows #86731
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Pick some low-hanging fruit in physical promotion throughput #86792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Have physical promotion insert read backs before possible implicit control flow #86706
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow RBO for known relops even without a dominator #86774
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Guarded devirtualization: multiple type checks #86551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update NativeAot with latest ILLink changes #86712
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Remove cast bug #86789
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove inconsistent comments in Convert.cs #86425
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add adjacency row length check in System.Text.Json Topological Sort #86716
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • update MediaTypeNames #86770
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [7.0] Disable DllImportSearchPathsTest in mobile #86708
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix ISA outerloop tests #86705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Exclude unused bundle files in AppleAppBuilder #86316
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Expand CORINFO_HELP_CHKCASTANY cast #86728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add build-runtime-tests make target #86785
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2188652 #86779
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Re-enable ~6700 runtime tests that got disabled mistakenly #86747
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Run sdk tests on wasm PRs #86744
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow #86508
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf: Use `test-main.js` instead of `test-main-7.0.js` #86742
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [NativeAOT] A few changes to make stack walks a bit faster #86690
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][mt] Update memory views after growth, refactor string processing, fix SharedArrayBuffer detection #86664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • StreamOnSqlBytes Read/Write on Spans #86674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix receiving of 2nd register in struct #86144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add timestamps to XUnitLogChecker output #86737
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: expand qmarks earlier #86778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Read public GC options if available #86068
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Attempt to fix unfailing helix test run when testResults.xml are missing #86342
    area-Infrastructure
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    community-contribution, needs-area-label, os-haiku
  • Implement resource lookup in satellite assemblies #86689
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    NO-MERGE, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Add support for deferred failures during AOT compilation #86554
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • The AllocationTick threshold is computed by a Poisson process with a 100 KB mean. #85750
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
